content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to report your time:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TIME\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a company-wide web application for time report submission, aggregation, and analysis.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Daily time reporting is mandatory \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"for all production staff (employees and contractors) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"who have “Time Reporting” checked as Yes in their profile or if you are assigned to a project which requires time reporting. Contractors must report project activities, but for visibility purposes and completeness of time journals PM/RM may ask contractors to report also non-project activities (NPA) with a relevant description.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time Journal can be filled out at any time convenient but no later than 9:00 AM (GMT) of the first working day of the following week (usually Monday) or the first working day of the following month – whichever is earlier.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As we approach the Cutover Date \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you will receive detailed information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on project codes \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"for reporting internal and external project hours, as well as for reporting ‘non-project activities’ (including bench, resource management activities, etc.). Following your TIME training session, we will provide you a link to your “kb page”, an EPAM site, that contains all the necessary information. We will also arrange Q&A sessions before the first submission dates where you can ask your questions, if any.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7979,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2e4b39a2-0035-4828-b0ac-304e0d09d9fb/time`1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2e4b39a2-0035-4828-b0ac-304e0d09d9fb/time`1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"time`1.PNG\",\"name\":\"time`1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2e4b39a2-0035-4828-b0ac-304e0d09d9fb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":616,\"height\":66},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go autofill to automate your time reporting. For more information on autofill, go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTIME/Prefill+overview\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the \\\"Worklogs autofill\\\" page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you report in Jira and Jira and TIME are synchronized for your project (clarify with your project whether JIRA-TIME synchronization is used at all), you don’t need to report in TIME. All your activities will be reported in TIME automatically.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Work Instructions/Global Work Instructions/Work Instruction Time Reporting.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Ethics and Compliance Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for more information on reporting rules.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PLEASE NOTE:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. In case you have no project assignment (you are on Bench) please report your time to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NON-PROJECT ACTIVITIES - OTH - Other \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" section.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. In case you have a project assignment please report all your working hours to it.\\r \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. You will receive Part2 of the Onboarding trainings after the Cutover Day, soon after 1st April 2023. The completion time is estimated to be around net 5-6 hours in total. We advise you to complete the trainings in a timely manner in smaller daily instalments.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The forthcoming Onboarding trainings are 2 fold: time spent on the training could be reported to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NON-PROJECT ACTIVITIES - OTH - Other section\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please make sure that your production work and customer deadlines are properly prioritized.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. All optional trainings (such as English courses and other ones where you register on your own) are considered as \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-working hours and not required to be reported\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You might receive additional information on training registration on the pre-cutover training.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5﻿. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The public holidays and official days off don't need to be reported in TIME.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You will see these days as greyed out (similar to weekends) and the system doesn't expect the reporting on these days from you. However, such days are not locked and available for reporting, so if you need to report project-related hours you can do it. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Location specific subsection(s) under NPA, or specific activity descriptions, or lines might also appear here (like training activities for BE team). You will learn more about these in the training and in the follow-up materials.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. If you report in JIRA, and there is synchronization established between Jira in Time on your project, you don’t need to report work logs in TIME – all activities will be synchronized automatically. In order to check please contact your project coordinator or project manager. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case you are working over your planned workload due to production needs, this work may be considered as overtime activities in case it is approved by the project manager / delivery manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please do not report hours over your expected time until you have approval from your project.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn how to submit overtime requests, familiarize yourself with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTIME/Employee#Employee-OvertimereportingOvertime\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this guide.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For invoice processing purposes Time Journals of contractors are auto-replicated to the SimplePay invoicing system\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are obliged to register time-off in the EPAM Vacation system. Per agreement with resource manager, contractors may be asked to report ‘leave without pay’ in Vacation system.
